actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution that there be printed as a House document a concise and selected nationwide record of the Bicentennial Captive Nations Week proclamation, statements, and relevant material.

summary.text: Directs that there be printed as a House document a record of the Bicentennial Captive Nations Week proclamations.

titles.title: Resolution that there be printed as a House document a concise and selected nationwide record of the Bicentennial Captive Nations Week proclamation, statements, and relevant material.
